<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// RewriteRope - A powerful string class.  This class supports extremely</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// efficient insertions and deletions into the middle of it, even for</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/rewriterope"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/rewriterope/#a16f868030332526d65b27521846a58e9">RewriteRope</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// We allocate space for string data out of a buffer of size AllocChunkSize.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This keeps track of how much space is left.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/intrusiverefcntptr">llvm::IntrusiveRefCntPtr&lt;RopeRefCountString&gt;</a> AllocBuffer;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">enum</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123; AllocChunkSize = 4080 &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AllocOffs = AllocChunkSize;</span></CodeLine>
